#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    priority_queue<pair<int,int>,vector<pair<int,int> >,greater<pair<int,int> > >P;
    priority_queue<pair<int,int> >Q;
    int count=0,op,x,n;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    while(n--)
    {
        scanf("%d",&op);
        if(op==2 && count/3==0)
        {
            printf("No reviews yet\n");
        }
        else if(op==2 && count/3>0)
        {
            printf("%d\n",P.top().first);
        }
        else if(op==1)
        {
            scanf("%d",&x);
            count++;
            Q.push(make_pair(x,1));
            if(count==3)
            {
                P.push(Q.top());
                Q.pop();
            }
            else if(count%3!=0 && count>3)
            {
                if(Q.top().first>P.top().first)
                {
                    pair<int,int> z;
                    z=P.top();
                    P.pop();
                    P.push(Q.top());
                    Q.pop();
                    Q.push(z);
                }
            }
            else if(count%3==0)
            {
                P.push(Q.top());
                Q.pop();
            }
        }
    }
    return(0);
}
